attributes.action: Deport Learco Chindamo after completing his jail sentence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following recent reports that Chindamo will be allowed to stay in the UK on his release from prison for the murder of Philip Lawrence. Forget the Bill of Human Rights what about the rights of Mrs Lawrence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
